mainText:
Steve,  You created history around the world.

When I was growing up Coca Cola united all of us, today it's the i-phone

Everytime you introduced an idea or a product it felt like Christmas!   
Thank you for all the attention to detail and design.

Having my first i-phone in my hand felt like holding a precious  
jewel.  And your first Mac with the rainbow Apple sits as an art piece.

I am so proud to have lived to hear you, see you and be part of your  
legacy. You will forever be remembered.
author: Maruchi
